overview: MAD HOUSE Tells a story of couples enmeshed in obsession and infatuation leading to an unexplainable web of infidelity. A jobless graduate, Efosa (Nosa Rex) gets a wind of the solid act and decides to make fortunes from blackmail. MAD HOUSE Tells the story of couples enmeshed in obsession and infatuation leading to an unexplainable web of infidelity.
title: Mad House
